# Day 11

## Part 1

> How many seats are occupied
> after the seating game?

Lazy solution:

```js
const input = `
L.LL.LL.LL
LLLLLLL.LL
L.L.L..L..
LLLL.LL.LL
L.LL.LL.LL
L.LLLLL.LL
..L.L.....
LLLLLLLLLL
L.LLLLLL.L
L.LLLLL.LL
`.trim()

let previousArrangement = input

const finalSeats = input.split('\n').reduce(reducer, [])
const occupiedSeats = finalSeats.join('').match(/(#)/g).length
console.log(occupiedSeats)

function reducer(newRows, row, y, currentRows) {
  const newRow = [...row].reduce((newSeats, seat, x, currentSeats) => {
    if (seat === '.') {
      return newSeats + seat
    }

    const neighbors = [
      currentRows[y - 1]?.[x - 1],
      currentRows[y - 1]?.[x],
      currentRows[y - 1]?.[x + 1],

      currentSeats[x - 1],
      currentSeats[x + 1],

      currentRows[y + 1]?.[x - 1],
      currentRows[y + 1]?.[x],
      currentRows[y + 1]?.[x + 1],
    ]

    if (seat === 'L' && !neighbors.includes('#')) {
      return newSeats + '#'
    }

    if (seat === '#' && neighbors.filter((n) => n === '#').length >= 4) {
      return newSeats + 'L'
    }

    return newSeats + seat
  }, '')
  newRows.push(newRow)

  if (y !== currentRows.length - 1) {
    return newRows
  }

  const newArrangement = newRows.join('\n')

  // Calm has ensued ðŸ˜Œ
  if (previousArrangement === newArrangement) {
    return newRows
  }

  // Has not!
  previousArrangement = newArrangement

  return newRows.reduce(reducer, [])
}
```

## Part 2

> Play the seating game again,
> but now with slightly different rules.
> How many seats are occupied in the end?

We have to change two things from Part 1.
First, the neighbors can be more far away,
so let's implement a helper function for getting them:

```diff
 const neighbors = [
-  currentRows[y - 1]?.[x - 1],
-  currentRows[y - 1]?.[x],
-  currentRows[y - 1]?.[x + 1],
-
-  currentSeats[x - 1],
-  currentSeats[x + 1],
-
-  currentRows[y + 1]?.[x - 1],
-  currentRows[y + 1]?.[x],
-  currentRows[y + 1]?.[x + 1],
+  getSeat(currentRows, x, y, -1, -1),
+  getSeat(currentRows, x, y,  0, -1),
+  getSeat(currentRows, x, y, +1, -1),
+  getSeat(currentRows, x, y, -1,  0),
+  getSeat(currentRows, x, y, +1,  0),
+  getSeat(currentRows, x, y, -1, +1),
+  getSeat(currentRows, x, y,  0, +1),
+  getSeat(currentRows, x, y, +1, +1),
 ]
```

Here's the new function:

```js
function getSeat(currentRows, x, y, xOffset, yOffset) {
  const seat = currentRows[y + yOffset]?.[x + xOffset]
  return !seat || seat === 'L' || seat === '#'
    ? seat
    : getSeat(currentRows, x + xOffset, y + yOffset, xOffset, yOffset)
}
```

And here's the second required change:

```diff
-if (seat === '#' && neighbors.filter((n) => n === '#').length >= 4) {
+if (seat === '#' && neighbors.filter((n) => n === '#').length >= 5) {
   return newSeats + 'L'
 }
```

[_flems_](https://flems.io/#0=N4IgtglgJlA2CmIBcBGADGgNCAzvBAxgC7xTK4D2sArkRBQHYB0AVjiNgGYQLtIDaoBgEMwiJCAgMADrVbtsBRiQZFyShjiIACKbJ0BebQAMAOgwAyV602t37th-ecXHLu2-denLz-fPOfr7BHj7eXkHhUaEWAVGRgWHRyYnBQY5BceF+CRHenpG57gm5WVZMRSkhqeXVta7JGV5l9TY5dQ0dVTUxaU4tnb22hUmDSeklxY3W5pWDw92to10Lcw2llsvtgUUVXT29YQUJsxVn5+VnrhnDF1d35497N7eP65erz-fXe5cD6ct5mNgVU1jd9jNNtlAW4FtEChDJvDITkmtcbFNDiD9mssdEAgilnjgbijhjEcjIQcUnCIZTQkjqVTASzRozsQD2cSrKdUW9wb8ruj+V9Yes7j9PhdheLam9XAMnGLMXk6qSQXDSf8DiMsWDydjDb94jyoQbVWzFiTDRbWS1BRyOrrbVbaXazUTrdTCT11aCbQS8dtLdyfZ0--56d6iQAcmUlhQa4I2A5dk2TJeRITiqEvhFxLHAJQHLr24WLPeQIpUa1kZRZMUxcFH6pIB7aerl4mKaV6ZqTatUqdlrVWvWp5JZFWHQa1eFNKRIV7vmn65iFPmyjKBEkWeh6ZaFrECWMtncZt2LtdFVUxMp-opkuO1DANHUaqhFVmoFcxojVImDt0e1DaFGEsvl4a-uhNVfQVkklVSlaeVRLyCt5lGFrmhGgyDkNtJVh3vpBgmxS4alPgpHVIddI2vTqXU8ThZkHfOAXqbG2PjGjn2FXqTULiTunwc+gbnhR8WvAW3kLf1y3g7u0pC1Nq2o+SxkmRJaXBkjjN1VldMA2habM-kIyk09NJ4WtKNkxSyX2adx0bT1xPoz9NOPQySkGzePX2gipvU-OF2jkbl1Mg972a+LbP6fugdzRWS1+fDIdkd9sLlst1zybsD7Qkx3V2+6isIar4YGVxW0645ifdXOdsGeueeldnLvYYBI301M8uU3022deTxv527BetLjNce0VdKua7+vDSdv2CQnvc2sJBKavK0OlrW8NMaiC2+dHY0z48BPNTNx0hBXQ8Y63hkMRlWsW-4Hoy1jm3J7jJ--l4MOSIk56zNnaGBXs4JrKUDqpQAQzAkrtDStlfK45RBTnKtVdofZ1ysDaA1TqvVBqslyrxQqk1SqQVqu0MSzVNrtW6ppTCh1pinVHMVRs91FqtXBO0GgO1--1Am8OmpE327QdLtAAAk9N3IoEQOd0LrMSOkW56TTm5PLPswl41AWfPya-bM3x2WgkhPCeYUT4zJmUIrbm5t1bW2FojSqgA8pwTgeAiB7Pq41plXnrm3MfUYdjSr+AsdJbs1rTXQkAH4mD8GBRe4Fw2mW9sxT5udj6AA+y2yXDpA2Oid2hVvrdMU+y9GGsWjb20QXlSAyuJpDVVkF03ZvNYtReobDWmsgvuy1l77XCvEMUBQMACSEBYOQAwagsBYDYDwIQKZfAQAABYkAACYABsjDQkMKAA)

## What did I learn?

Nothing,
not even after refactoring Part 2,
which initially had this _:sparkles: beautiful :sparkles:_ solution:

```js
const neighbors = [
  getUpperLeftSeat(currentRows, i, j),
  getUpperSeat(currentRows, i, j),
  getUpperRightSeat(currentRows, i, j),
  getLeftSeat(currentRows, i, j),
  getRightSeat(currentRows, i, j),
  getLowerLeftSeat(currentRows, i, j),
  getLowerSeat(currentRows, i, j),
  getLowerRightSeat(currentRows, i, j),
]

// ...

function getUpperLeftSeat(currentRows, i, j) {
  for (i--, j--; i >= 0 && j >= 0; i--, j--) {
    const seat = currentRows[i][j]
    if (seat === 'L' || seat === '#') return seat
  }
}

function getUpperSeat(currentRows, i, j) {
  for (i--; i >= 0; i--) {
    const seat = currentRows[i][j]
    if (seat === 'L' || seat === '#') return seat
  }
}

function getUpperRightSeat(currentRows, i, j) {
  for (i--, j++; i >= 0 && j < currentRows[0].length; i--, j++) {
    const seat = currentRows[i][j]
    if (seat === 'L' || seat === '#') return seat
  }
}

function getLeftSeat(currentRows, i, j) {
  for (j--; j >= 0; j--) {
    const seat = currentRows[i][j]
    if (seat === 'L' || seat === '#') return seat
  }
}

function getRightSeat(currentRows, i, j) {
  for (j++; j < currentRows[0].length; j++) {
    const seat = currentRows[i][j]
    if (seat === 'L' || seat === '#') return seat
  }
}

function getLowerLeftSeat(currentRows, i, j) {
  for (i++, j--; i < currentRows.length && j >= 0; i++, j--) {
    const seat = currentRows[i][j]
    if (seat === 'L' || seat === '#') return seat
  }
}

function getLowerSeat(currentRows, i, j) {
  for (i++; i < currentRows.length; i++) {
    const seat = currentRows[i][j]
    if (seat === 'L' || seat === '#') return seat
  }
}

function getLowerRightSeat(currentRows, i, j) {
  for (
    i++, j++;
    i < currentRows.length && j < currentRows[0].length;
    i++, j++
  ) {
    const seat = currentRows[i][j]
    if (seat === 'L' || seat === '#') return seat
  }
}
```

I'm still so proud. :rofl:

because I know you want to!
